SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: End date MIMED Data address
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_USR_UMHS_BATCH_ENDDATEADDRESS ( @ID uniqueidentifier ,@ENDDATE datetime ,@REASONCODEID uniqueidentifier = null ,@CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null ) as begin
set nocount on;
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
update dbo.USR_UMHS_ADDRESS set ISPRIMARY=0 ,DONOTMAILREASONCODEID=@REASONCODEID ,DONOTMAIL = 1 ,HISTORICALENDDATE=@ENDDATE ,CHANGEDBYID=@CHANGEAGENTID ,DATECHANGED=@CURRENTDATE where ID=@ID
end
